full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title - RFP for Location Work of Additive Tank and Distribution System
#### Reference Number: WS3937663222-Doc3937703506
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Solicitation Number: WS3937663222
#### Publication Date: March 28, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date & Time: April 24th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
#### Amendment Date: April 20, 2023

**Note:** This tender opportunity is now expired.

### Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the location work of additive tank and distribution system in Bagotville, Quebec. The RFP involves installation of the additive tank and distribution system as detailed in Annex A.

### Eligible Suppliers
Only pre-qualified suppliers who have a supply arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada are eligible to submit bids. The following firms are pre-qualified for this opportunity:

* GMR Inc.
* PETRO HiTECH
* Services Pétroliers MT Inc.
* Service et Construction mobile
* Equipements Pétroliers Claude Pedneault Inc
* SM Construction

### Tender Documents
Tender documents will be distributed solely to the above-mentioned pre-qualified suppliers. These suppliers are required to submit their bids at the latest by April 24th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

For more information, please click on the following link:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15831595?extsite=MTU4MzE1OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15831595?extsite=MTU4MzE1OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

 

**Contact Information**

Lussier, Joël
joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca Kane
